She gripped the velvet bedding as his tongue found her center, the beard she'd always admired rough against her sensitive flesh. 'Please,' she gasped, pulling him up. He entered her slowly, reverently—no lord had ever touched her with such care. They moved together in the flickering light, her cries muffled against his shoulder. When they finished, she traced the sword calluses on his hands. 'If my father discovers us—' 'He won't,' Aldric promised. 'And if he does, I'll fight every knight in the realm for you.'
